subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[혼]], [[곤]]|eumhun=|rv=hon, gon|mr=hon, kon|y=hon, kon}}

# ([[섞다|섞을]] [[혼]]): [[mix]], [[confuse]], [[blend]]
# ([[흐리다|흐릴]] [[혼]]): [[turbid]], [[unclear]]
# ([[오랑캐]] [[이름]] [[곤]]): (perhaps mixed) [[tribe]]s west of ancient China.
#* [[混夷]] ([[곤이]], ''gon-i'') tribes west of ancient China
#* 混夷駾矣 ([[詩經]]) (곤이태의 ([[시경]]), ''gon-i-tae-ui (sigyeong)'') Western tribes ride.
#* [[西戎]] ([[서융]], ''seo-yung'') tribes west of ancient China

[[Category:Hanja readings|혼]]
